content: This message came to me concerning Egypt:
In that day the Egyptians will be as weak as women. They will cower in fear beneath the upraised fist of the  of Heaven’s Armies.
Just to speak the name of Israel will terrorize them, for the  of Heaven’s Armies has laid out his plans against them.
In that day five of Egypt’s cities will follow the  of Heaven’s Armies. They will even begin to speak Hebrew, the language of Canaan. One of these cities will be Heliopolis, the City of the Sun.
In that day there will be an altar to the  in the heart of Egypt, and there will be a monument to the  at its border.

It will be a sign and a witness that the  of Heaven’s Armies is worshiped in the land of Egypt. When the people cry to the  for help against those who oppress them, he will send them a savior who will rescue them.
The  will make himself known to the Egyptians. Yes, they will know the  and will give their sacrifices and offerings to him. They will make a vow to the  and will keep it.
The  will strike Egypt, and then he will bring healing. For the Egyptians will turn to the , and he will listen to their pleas and heal them.
In that day Egypt and Assyria will be connected by a highway. The Egyptians and Assyrians will move freely between their lands, and they will both worship God.
In that day Israel will be the third, along with Egypt and Assyria, a blessing in the midst of the earth.
For the  of Heaven’s Armies will say, “Blessed be Egypt, my people. Blessed be Assyria, the land I have made. Blessed be Israel, my special possession!”
